body: Without the cast there is a `error: constant expression evaluates to 2147483648 which cannot be narrowed to type 'int' [-Wc++11-narrowing]` error. I think `0x80000000` is actually over the range for int, and originally it was intended to be evaluated to `-2147483648`, not `2147483648` (as it would be if it's an unsigned int by default).
